description:
You've just found your temporary home while in NYC! This Beautiful 1 bed apt is just 7 minutes walk to Times square, 10 minutes walk to Central Park. Bar/restaurants are a walk away and offer a wide variety for those who love to dine out! Really a fun hip area for anyone looking for that fun aspect of night-life and a touristy area for your daily activities!! Apartment will be 100% furnished, very clean, and well kept.

This is such a very 1BR beautiful and cozy apartment on the 4th floor of a walk-up building with a quite and peaceful ambiance. The apartment comes with a queen size sofa bed in the living room. Wireless internet is available and complimentary. Queen size bed located in the bedroom.    Because it is so well located, you may want to walk to lots of places like Times Square (7 min walk), Rockefeller Center (10 min walk), Lincoln Center (15 min walk), Central Park (10 min walk).

All yours:)
name: 1 bedroom apt in the heart of Hell's Kitchen!
review: Dror was a great host. He responded very quickly and made every effort to accommodate my needs. Very good space for 1-3 people, with a pull out futon. I highly recommend, and would not hesitate to book again!
